tool_description: Google Translate Plus API provides lightning-fast and precise multilingual translations, equipped with real-time features, language identification, and text-to-speech conversion. Seamlessly integrate robust translation services into your apps and extend your global presence with our comprehensive documentation and wide-ranging language support.
name: Google Translate Plus
title: Google Translate Plus

api_list.name: detect

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Please provide the text for which you want to detect the language.

api_list.name: translate

required_parameters.name: target_lang
required_parameters.description: enter language code of target language ( you can get language code here : https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/languages)
